item.title: A Study in Surveillance Realism
item.description: Introduction Pending; requires a completed essay and thesis. Platform Capitalism, the Time/Space Crunch, and a New Economy In recent years, there has been a serious effort by some on the left to develop a political economic critique of capitalism that is attentive to, what seems to be, a fundamental restructuring of the relationship between labor, capital, and technology. There is no sense in reanalyzing or redefining concepts already sufficiently outlined by political economists.
